Room.Name: Riverdell Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Riverdell Way, west of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: the impressive City Walls on the east side of the road stand nearly ten meters high at some points, protecting the city and its citizens from attacks and raids from the outside world. The realm ouside the City Walls is very deadly and not very fun to visit. Only the bravest people venture out into the wilderness.
